enableStockCheck.description: Flag to enable ot disable stock check in app

inventoryLevel.description: This setting defines how inventory levels are calculated

inventoryRanges.description: This setting defines displays which inventory ranges are displayed on the site, only applicable if Total Available or Physical Available are selected

warehouseAggregation.description: This setting defines if inventory  should be calculated based on individual warehouse or if it should an aggregate of  the applicable warehouses.

enum.multiple: Based on aggregate for Shipping and Pickup warehouses

outOfStockThreshold.description: Active when Inventory Buffer is selected. Threshold to use when determining if a product is out of stock or not -- if its less than or equal to this value, it'll be marked as out of stock

productListInventoryDisplay.friendlyName: Inventory settings for product list pages.
productListInventoryDisplay.description: This setting defines how out of stock products should be displayed in product lists such as Product Collection and Search results modules.

enum.hideOOS: Hide out of stock products from list
enum.sortOOS: Display out of stock products at the end of the list

maxQuantityForCartLineItem.description: Limit to the number of copies of an item that can be added to a cart line

hideRating.description: This settings hides the rating for products across the site

geolocationApiUrl.description: Geolocation Api endpoint used to retrieve the location information in bopis search

reviewTextMaxLength.description: Maximum number of characters for the review text

reviewTitleMaxLength.description: Maximum number of characters for the title

disableTooltip.description: Flag to disable tooltip on items

searchInputMaxLength.description: Maximum number of characters for the search input field

addToCartBehavior.description: This setting defines the experience when a product is added to cart

enum.nothing: Do not navigate to cart page

giftCardSupported.description: This property defines the type of gift card that should be allowed

enum.both: Dynamics 365, SVS and Givex gift cards

breadcrumbType.description: This setting defines the breadcrumb display on Product page

enum.categoryAndBack: Show category hierarchy and back to results

shouldUseNewImageComponent.description: This setting enables the new image logic which shows a placeholder image and low resolution images while the actual image is loading. This can be overridden on the module by setting “Disable lazy load” to true.

unitOfMeasureDisplayType.friendlyName: Display unit of measure for products
unitOfMeasureDisplayType.description: This setting defines the display of unit of measure for a product

enum.buybox: Display in the product buying experience
enum.buyboxAndBrowse: Display in the product browsing and buying experience

shouldEnableSinglePaymentAuthorizationCh.description: This setting streamlines payment authorization by making a single request that includes a request for tokenization and an authorization for the amount due. When enabled, the payment module must be placed as the last step in checkout prior to place order.

dimensionsAsSwatchType.description: This setting defines which dimensions will be displayed as a color, image, or inline text. It applies to all experiences that support dimension selection such as buy box, quick view, search results, and product collection modules.

dimensionsInProductCard.friendlyName: Dimensions to display in product card
dimensionsInProductCard.description: This setting defines which dimensions should be displayed when browsing the products. It applies to product collection and search results modules. It is not recommended to turn it on when the products have lots of dimensions as it may cause some bad user experience as the product cards will be big.

rnrPrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy Policy for Ratings and Reviews
